alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:43AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern La Salle, northern McMullen and west central Live Oak Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 742 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tilden, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Choke Canyon, Tilden, Calliham, Crowther, Cross and Zella. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central Texas.
